snippet.title: Borderland 4 - Wish I Knew Sooner | Tips, Tricks, & Game Knowledge for New Players
snippet.description:
Just starting out in Borderlands 4...or are you already well on your way to conquering Kairos? Well never fear, your friends at Legacy Gaming have tons of tricks to help you take on the Timekeeper and dominate the wastelands. We share our favorite gameplay tips and tricks that will help you understand the game and set you on the right path to surviving in Gearbox Entertainment's new open-world looter-shooter, Borderland 4.

0:00 Intro
0:19 The 10% Rule
1:31 The Environment Is Your Friend
2:21 Propulsion Jump From Vehicle + Grapple Reset
3:11 Easy Legendary Chests
4:00 Don't Skip Your Rewards
5:30 Damage Types & Status Effects
7:18 Big Bank Energy
8:05 Time For A Firmware Upgrade
9:36 Unlocking Vaults
11:19 Maurice's Black Market
12:25 Fishing For Loot
14:01 Major Enemy Affixes
16:59 Subscribe For More Borderlands 4
